name: Find emails for persons in a Google Sheets spreadsheet using Hunter
description: Every time a new row added to a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet, Integromat will automatically find a person's email using provided first name, last name and company, then update a row with email of a person found in Hunter. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1i2uevibHKN7vSyuLzRzgiRatbTWqH2TCkU9Y_x482lY/edit?usp=sharing).
